entry.title: White Waffle Terry Turkish Cotton Bathrobe
entry.summary:
Vendor: Classic Turkish Towels
Type: Bathrobe
Price: 46.99

Boost your comfort as you step out of the shower and into this luxurious Home bath robe featuring a soft and pleasant Turkish-cotton construction. A waffle weave gives this bath robe a modern look, and a tie belt offers an adjustable unisex design. Eco-friendly and machine washable, this robe provides practical use and convenience.

entry.summary:
Vendor: HGM Manor
Type: Bathrobe
Price: 61.99

Our Duchene bathrobes are perfect for lounging all year long! Our bathrobes come in several sizes to accommodate both men and women of all forms. Features an elegant thick shawl collar design. Famously used in 5 star hotels and spas around the world. entry.summary:
Vendor: Classic Turkish Towels
Type: Bathrobe

entry.title: Anichini Shawl Turkish Cotton Bathrobe
entry.summary:
Vendor: Anichini
Type: Bathrobe
Price: 67.99

The latest addition to our robe collection, our new Shawl Collar Robe, is made from a rich, very absorbent cotton Turkish terry. Made from a 100% cotton Turkish terry which is exceedingly thick and absorbent. Sculpted in a variation of the classic "Check" hotel towel. Turkey has been renowned for weaving the finest terry towels for centuries and these are among the best of the best. Why does Turkey weave the finest terry? It truly is the best!
